LUKE 8.14 iþ þata in þaurnuns gadriusando þai sind þai gahausjandans jah af saurgom jah gabein jah gabaurjoþum þizos libainais gaggandans afƕapnand jah ni gawrisqand.
LUKE 8.15 iþ þata ana þizai godon airþai þai sind þai ize in hairtin godamma jah seljamma gahausjandans þata waurd gahaband jah akran bairand in þulainai.
LUKE 8.16 aþþan ni manna lukarn tandjands dishuljiþ ita kasa aiþþau uf ligr satjiþ, ak ana lukarnastaþin gasatjiþ, ei þai inngaggandans saiƕaina liuhad.
LUKE 8.17 ni auk ist analaugn, þatei swikunþ ni wairþai, nih fulgin, þatei ni gakunnaidau jah in swekunþamma qimai.
LUKE 8.18 saiƕiþ nu ƕaiwa hauseiþ;
unte saei habaiþ, gibada imma, jah saei ni habaiþ, jah þatei þugkeiþ haban, afnimada af imma.
LUKE 8.19 atiddjedun þan du imma aiþei jah broþrjus is jah ni mahtedun andqiþan imma faura managein.
LUKE 8.20 jah gataihan warþ imma þatei
aiþei þeina jah broþrjus þeinai standand uta gasaiƕan þuk gairnjandona.
LUKE 8.21 iþ is andhafjands qaþ du im:
aiþei meina jah broþrjus meinai þai sind, þai waurd gudis gahausjandans jah taujandans.
LUKE 8.22 warþ þan in ainamma þize dage,
jah is galaiþ in skip jah siponjos is, jah qaþ du im:
galeiþam hindar þana marisaiw!
jah galiþun.
LUKE 8.23 þaruh þan swe faridedun, anasaislep;
jah atiddja skura windis in þana marisaiw, jah gafullnodedun jah birekjai waurþun.
LUKE 8.24 duatgaggandans þan urraisidedun ina qiþandans:
talzjand, fraqistnam!
iþ is urreisands gasok winda jah þamma wega watins;
jah anaslawaidedun jah warþ wis.
LUKE 8.25 qaþ þan du im:
ƕar ist galaubeins izwara?
ogandans þan sildaleikidedun qiþandans du sis misso:
ƕas siai sa, ei jah windam faurbiudiþ jah watnam, jah ufhausjand imma?
LUKE 8.26 jah atfaridedun in gawi Gaddarene, þatei ist wiþrawairþ Galeilaia.
LUKE 8.27 usgaggandin þan imma ana airþa, gamotida imma wair sums us baurg saei habaida unhulþons mela lagga jah wastjom ni gawasiþs was jah in garda ni gawas, ak in hlaiwasnom.
LUKE 8.28 gasaiƕands þan Iesu jah ufhropjands draus du imma jah stibnai mikilai qaþ:
ƕa mis jah þus, Iesu, sunau gudis hauhistins?
bidja þuk,
ni balwjais mis.
LUKE 8.29 unte anabaud ahmin þamma unhrainjin usgaggan af þamma mann;
manag auk mel frawalw ina, jah bundans was eisarnabandjom jah fotubandjom fastaiþs was, jah dishniupands þos bandjos draibiþs was fram þamma unhulþin ana auþidos.
LUKE 8.30 frah þan ina Iesus qiþands:
ƕa ist namo þein?
þaruh qaþ: harjis; unte unhulþons managos galiþun in ina.
LUKE 8.31 jah bad ina ei ni anabudi im in afgrundiþa galeiþan.
LUKE 8.32 was-uþ-þan jainar hairda sweine managaize haldanaize in þamma fairgunja;
jah bedun ina ei uslaubidedi im in þo galeiþan.
jah uslaubida im.
LUKE 8.33 usgaggandans þan suns þai unhulþans af þamma mann galiþun in þo sweina, jah rann sa wriþus and driuson in þana marisaiw jah afƕapnodedun.
LUKE 8.34 gasaiƕandans þan þai haldandans þata waurþano gaþlauhun jah gataihun in baurg jah in weihsa.
LUKE 8.35 usiddjedun þan saiƕan þata waurþano jah qemun at Iesua jah bigetun sitandan þana mannan af þammei unhulþons usiddjedun, gawasidana jah fraþjandan faura fotum Iesuis, jah ohtedun.
LUKE 8.36 gataihun þan im jah þai gasaiƕandans ƕaiwa ganas sa daimonareis.
LUKE 8.37 jah bedun ina allai gaujans þize Gaddarene galeiþan fairra sis, unte agisa mikilamma dishabaidai wesun.
iþ is galeiþands in skip gawandida sik.
LUKE 8.38 baþ þan ina sa wair af þammei þos unhulþons usiddjedun, ei wesi miþ imma;
fralailot þan ina Iesus qiþands:
LUKE 8.39 gawandei þuk du garda þeinamma jah usspillo ƕan filu gatawida þus guþ.
jah galaiþ and baurg alla merjands ƕan filu gatawida imma Iesus.
LUKE 8.40 warþ þan, miþþanei gawandida sik Iesus, andnam ina managei;
wesun auk allai beidandans is.
LUKE 8.41 jah sai, qam wair þizei namo Iaeirus, sah fauramaþleis swnagogais was, jah driusands faura fotum Iesuis bad ina gaggan in gard seinana;
